alert.note: Alert for Beadle (South Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Sioux Falls (Southeastern SD, Southwestern MN, and Northwestern IA)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued April 18 at 8:41AM MDT until further notice by NWS Sioux Falls
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in South Dakota...Iowa... Big Sioux River near Brookings affecting Moody and Brookings Counties. James River near Mitchell affecting Hanson and Davison Counties. James River near Forestburg affecting Sanborn County. James River at Huron affecting Beadle County. Big Sioux River at Brandon affecting Minnehaha, Lyon and Lincoln Counties. Big Sioux River near Estelline affecting Hamlin and Brookings Counties. Big Sioux River at Sioux Falls I-90 affecting Minnehaha County. Big Sioux River near Bruce affecting Brookings County. ...FLOOD WARNING FOR SNOWMELT REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL FURTHER NOTICE... * WHAT...Moderate flooding is occurring and moderate flooding is forecast. * WHERE...James River at Huron. * WHEN...Until further notice. * IMPACTS...At 14.0 feet, numerous county and township roads in Beadle County will be flooded. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 8:00 AM CDT Tuesday the stage was 13.3 feet. - Recent Activity...The maximum river stage in the 24 hours ending at 8:00 AM CDT Tuesday was 13.3 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to remain around 13.3 feet today and then fall to 11.7 feet Tuesday morning. - Flood stage is 11.0 feet. && Fld Observed Forecasts (7 am CDT) Location Stg Stg Day/Time Wed Thu Fri James River Huron 11.0 13.3 Tue 8 am 12.9 12.7 12.6 &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. The next statement will be issued Wednesday morning at 1145 AM CDT.
